snippet: Kraft Heinz said it would eliminate 2,500 jobs in the United States and Canada, including about 700 at its headquarters in Northfield, Ill.
abstract: Kraft Heinz announces that it will cut 2,500 jobs in United States and Canada, including about 700 at its headquarters in Northfield, Ill.
lead_paragraph: Kraft Heinz said it would eliminate 2,500 jobs in the United States and Canada, including about 700 at its headquarters in Northfield, Ill.

headline.main: Kraft Heinz Announces Job Cuts in U.S. and Canada
headline.print_headline: Kraft Heinz Announces Job Cuts in U.S. and Canada
